text:
I am not able to print the stack trace of the exception in my logger(if e is 
the object of exception then i want to print e.printStackTrace() out put in 
logger).Please help me, i already made a request in user list 2 weeks ago  but 
not found an answer for this.
creator: raghava.a.v@conject.com
ceki@apache.org
text:
Please read the documentation for the Category.debug(Object, Throwable)

It is avaialble here:

http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/docs/api/org/apache/log4j/Category.html#debug
(java.lang.Object,%20java.lang.Throwable)
